website_summaries.verdict: While it has a much shorter battery life than similar pens, this capacitive stylus pairs with a wide range of devices and performs reliably.
pros: Pairs quickly with iOS devices and many Android devices (particularly Samsung tablets), and is very responsive
Rechargeable batteries are a convenient plus
cons: Only holds a charge for 4 to 7 hours depending on level of use
May not work with some non-iOS tablets

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use, not so much for art.
customer_reviews.text: For an everyday stylus this works great. For moving emails and basic stylus usage you won't be disappointed, but for creating art in a program the sensitivity is a little off. I tried it in a couple different programs to make sure it wasn't the program itself and each time had the same issues. There was a drag effect and/or loss of pressure sensitivity. The image attached is something I was able to create after a couple of attempts and was created in Adobe Draw. I love that it is powered by an AAAA battery and comes with an USB charger and an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Great Stylus for active or inactive screens
customer_reviews.text: I have a touchscreen laptop, but haven't been able to use it for writing in any way because I couldn't find a stylus which would make precise enough lines. This stylus has solved my problem. I am able to take notes on documents onscreen with ease, and they are legible, which was always impossible previously. I have also used it on my iPhone and Kindle, and it works great. I especially like that it comes with a USB battery charger and 2 batteries, one for the stylus, and one to keep charged. That way, you never have to worry about it dying in the middle of use. Highly recommended if you are looking for an affordable active stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Mperry

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Active Stylus
customer_reviews.text: Nice active stylus. It works well for me even through my Mr Shield For Huawei MediaPad M3 glass screen protector. The first one I received had to be replaced due to the tip adjustment would not adjust. Koopin quickly to care of a replacement which is fine. My only issue is that the batteries cannot be recharged without removing them from the pen, otherwise 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: RMSCHUYLER

customer_reviews.title: Great Weight
customer_reviews.text: Great change from the standard mini styluses. This has a nice weight to it. The fine tip is perfect and doesn’t cause you to select the wrong thing, as often happens with the larger tipped ones. It comes with two batteries so you can charge one while using it, so there’s no interruption when it runs out. I also wanted to point out, that this is just a stylus, it is not compatible with Windows Ink.
customer_reviews.author: K. Traft

customer_reviews.title: NOT pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it came with two batteries however I found they didn’t stay charged long. They sent me two so I was okay with having many batteries to swap out. I dropped one of the stylus’s and found the tip broke quite easily so I started using the spare. After only two days it stopped turning on even though I swapped out the battery. I chose this particular stylus due to issues with fine motor skill issues and gripping issues due to illness. I needed a stylus that was long with a decent sized diameter. The tip was also hard plastic so it was very noisy to use. Unfortunately I am unable to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S Thiemann

customer_reviews.title: It Does What It Should and Like It Should!
customer_reviews.text: It works beautifully for my new touch-screen flip Asus computer. This pen allows me to draw and "paint" with the downloaded apps easily and professionally. I am using it directly on the computer screen (with matte protector) which is easier than using my Wacom Bamboo. This pen does what it is supposed to do - drawn and write like pen on paper. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my Iphone 8 and Ipad Mini 2- along ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my Iphone 8 and Ipad Mini 2- along with all the other positive reviews, but best of all it has a rechargeable battery that is replaceable - normally items that have built in batteries its the battery that goes 1st., no longer taking a charge or short life after a charge that is the reason to have to buy a replacement, (in this case a stylus). Another great reason to get this great Stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Kim - Like a Girl

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Slim Pro Active Stylus Pen
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Slim Pro Active Stylus Pen. It is my very first active stylus. It is very light weight. Not too bulky. I also like the grey tone color. Very fresh and light. I wish that they had more variety of colors but maybe in the future :) I would very much use this stylus pen for when I go back to school and take notes. It came with 2 rechargeable batteries which I like also. I can use one while the other charges. The packaging is also very secure. My product was safe and secure. No scratches or anything. I would put this stylus to good use while still in school and for my future career.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: Dismal Battery Life, Decent Stylus
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is going to be an issue. It's just terrible. The manufacturer ships the stylus with two batteries, a charger, and a nice case to keep it in. For $50, I not only expect the stylus to be awesome, I expect it to go more than an hour before recharging. I may return this. It's really hard to find a good stylus, it seems, and at the price, I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Dieter67

customer_reviews.title: Smooth stylus
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice stylus; the tip is very small, very firm and smooth. It glides easily on the ipad and works well with my paint apps. Nice price too.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: The best I had tried until now and I had tried many
customer_reviews.text: Well it looks great, it feels a little heavy what is also great to draw but not toooo heavy to get the hand tired, and the better of all, after try almost every stylus I find at amazon this one draw and write as intended, very good. Also the battery until now I havent charge it, I have it for 8 days already, I dont draw all day but like 1 hour each day. I like it brings a spare AAAA litium battery included so you could charge it while using the other one
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Jordan R

customer_reviews.title: Better than Apple Pen!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after I lost my apple pen and wanted something a little cheaper. Wish I would have went with this first! I love how all I have to do is turn it on and it works. Having an extra battery, makes it where I can always have a full charge as well. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Baby PhD

customer_reviews.title: Useful stylus pen
customer_reviews.text: It is sensitive and very useful for my sketching needs. The package contains 2 rechargeable batteries as well with a charger. This ensures we never run out of battery.The grip feels good in hand. I tried drawing straight lines slowly and quickly and i didn't see any noticeable distortion. Also i don't see any lag
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, a bit iffy on initial contact to connect. Often have to retap before the pen and pad connect.
customer_reviews.author: Mikie Triedit

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It works but I'm not a huge fan. Thick and not particularly effective. Used with a surface laptop and it's nowhere near as nice as the pen I had before, but for the price it does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to use with my iPad Pro. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my iPad Pro. It works but not as smoothly as I hoped it would have worked. So I plan to go get an iPencil instead.
customer_reviews.author: spectrum805

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Better than other styluses I’ve tried but still skips a lot, not very smooth writing. It did work on my iPhone, iPad, and Asus tablet but didn’t look any better than writing with my finger. Decided to give in and buy the Apple Pencil to use with my iPad Pro. Much more expensive but very happy with it. Disappointed the SLIM PRO didn’t work for me on my other devices. Unfortunately, I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: choirlady

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery power.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good pen however, the battery only lasts a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Fine tip stylus, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Handy, sensitive, easy to use. Battery life is good for a day or so, but it comes with two batteries. Recharge the spare today, then swap them out tomorrow or the next day.
customer_reviews.author: booklion

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend To Any & Everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Lovveee this stylus. I use it on my iPhone 6s Plus & my Dell Notebook Laptop. It does everything I would’ve expected it to & writes much smoother & so eligantly. Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is bc of the battery life but hey it comes with a battery charger so...? What can ya really complain about?Lol. Two-Thumbs-Up #RecommendToAnyone
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed this. I like to use pen(stylus) when I am on my IPad.I expected better. Aftercharging more than then the required time it barely last an hour. Not what the add said. This pen was on the pricey side sso what happeed?
customer_reviews.author: Linda Arsenault

customer_reviews.title: The lower price is not enough to compensate for the poor performance. Will be using Apple pencil
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. But way to insensitivity to write with. The lower price is not enough to compensate for the poor performance. Will be using Apple pencil instead
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Ta

customer_reviews.title: Cheap POC, shuts off every 30 seconds. Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Shuts off every 30 seconds. Cheaply made and low quality. Not worth it. When it works it is great, but it hardly last longer than a minute. Charged both batteries, tried both batteries, same results. This was a waste of money. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Latency issues
customer_reviews.text: This active stylus says it has low latency but while drawing the drawing point is at least a 1/2 of an inch behind the stlus tip.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This stylus is very sturdy and handy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stylus is very sturdy and handy to use. The metal build gives it a very premium and durable feel. Its sleek design and compact form factor make it very easy to use and store, as well as give it a classical edge. Works well and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the pen doesn't work all that great. Battery didn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: IG:D.Willz.photography

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well with my HP x360
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well with my HP x360. Very smooth. Only wish is that there was a cap for the pen.
customer_reviews.author: namhn420

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied with my Stylus Pen - works like a dream ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly satisfied with my Stylus Pen - works like a dream with my Samsung tablet. Great for note taking, creating detailed diagrams, and signatures are just as clear as written with a pen and paper.
customer_reviews.author: mitch donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Works well; poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to hold, works very well. Would have given it a 4 or 5-Star rating if the batteries lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Spadazzi

customer_reviews.title: The adjustable tip is perfect for changing the sensitivity of it reaction to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This pen exceeded expectations. The adjustable tip is perfect for changing the sensitivity of it reaction to the tablet. Very durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Warrenburg

customer_reviews.title: Great pen
customer_reviews.text: Best stylus pen I've used. Comes with two batteries and a charger. My daughter loves it so much I'm thinking of ordering a second because she keeps taking mine 😂
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lee Neves

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works really well. compare to other expensive name brand tools
customer_reviews.author: ernie lopez

customer_reviews.title: Best stylus pen
customer_reviews.text: Best stylus ever! I have used many stylus pens and this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one specifically for iPad 2017 to take ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one specifically for iPad 2017 to take notes. At first I think it is not sensitive enough, but after using for a while, when you get use to the tip and incline a bit more on left, this stylus pen works well especially for taking note.
customer_reviews.author: wanyxie

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great and sturdy stylus. I like that it comes with two rechargeable batteries. I'm still getting a great deal of use out of it everyeveryday on my Chromebook Flip.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Ark

customer_reviews.title: Crazy amount of lag time between drawing on the screen and it showing up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pen to take notes on my tablet, but the lag is so bad on this pen that it cannot be used for notes. I have tried it on a Sony Xperia Z2 and a Google Pixel 2 XL. Lag is a teenie bit better on the Pixel but is still bad enough that I can not use it to take notes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cook

product_meta.title: SLIM PRO Stylus Pen for iPad, iPad Pro, iPhone Xs,iPhone Xs Max,iPhone XR,,Samsung Tablet,Most of IOS,Android Mobile Devices , Adjustable Fine Point Tip, Includes USB Charger, Rechargeable Battery,GRY
product_meta.description:
Color:grey

What’s included:

 * 1 x SLIM PRO Precision Fine Tip Active Stylus 
 * 2 x AAAA 300mah Ni-MH battery 
 * 1 x USB charger for AAAA 300mah Ni-MH battery 

 

Features:

 * Precision: SLIM PRO’s patented technology gives this 1.9mm tip the most accurate and precise writing and drawing experience. 
 * Sensitivity Adjustable Tip: sensibility adjustable tip minimizes offset and latency. Turn the tip with its specially designed mini tool for easy stroke-size adjustments. 
 * Apps Compatibility: SLIM PRO is compatible with a wide range of devices, OS platforms and apps. It works with most apps for note-taking, sketching, drawing etc. and other apps that support stylus input. 

 

Specifications:

 * Length: 137mm 
 * Barrel diameter: 11mm 
 * Tip diameter: 1.9mm 
 * Tip material: POM 
 * Barrel material: aluminum 
 * Powered by: 1 x AAAA Alkaline battery, or 1 x Ni-MH 300mah AAAA battery 
 * Continuous using time: up to 7 hours with AAAA Alkaline battery, or up to 5 hours with Ni-MH AAAA 300mah battery 
 * Charging time: up to 4 hours to fully charge 1 x 300mah AAAA Ni-MH battery by the Ni-MH AAAA USB charger which is included in the package 
 * Power saving mode: automatically powers off after 3 minutes idling 

 

Usage Tips : 

 *  Please make sure your device is not in charging mode and it's recommanded not to use screen protector on only ipad Pro 12.9" , other models are fine to use screen protector,please make sure the screen protector is less than 0.30mm . 
 * Please always de-activate first the original brand's stylus at " setting " or at any of the app you want to use , so your device can accept other brand's stylus pen . 
 * please adjust stylus tip,the longer tip you set the stronger signal you get . Vise Versa . 
 *  Contact us if you need further support.
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE TIP FOR SENSIBILITY：Made of durable POM material, the1.9mm fine point precision tip is built with a sensibility adjustment function which offers the most perfect and accurate writing and sketching experience with your electronic devices.

COMPATIBLE WITH：iPhone Xr , iphone Xs and iPhone Xs Max, iPad 1 2 3 4, iPad Mini 1 2 3 4, iPad Air 1 2, iPad Pro 9.7/12.9 (if with screen protector max 0.3mm thickness), iPhone 5/5S/5C, iPhone 6/6S Plus, iPhone 7/7 Plus, iPhone X/8/8 Plus ,Samsung smartphones & tablets, Asus/Dell/Surface notebooks and more.
EASY TO USE：No software or pairing needed, simply switch on power button to use. Then twist the tip to adjust the desired signal strength - weak for lighter strokes and strong for heavier strokes.

USB CHARGER AND RECHARGEABLE BATTERY INCLUDED：The USB charger, and 2 rechargeable batteries keep your stylus ON always .* When USB charger is in charging mode , indicator light is red , and LED light turns blue when battery is fully charged .

UP TO 5-7 HOURS OF CONTINUOUS USE：Powered by rechargeable battery, up to 7 hours of use with AAAA Alkaline battery or up to 5 hours with Ni-MH AAAA 300mah battery (included). Great for long commutes, travelling and day to day use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars77 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
